products.name: Mélange de légumes cuisinés issus de l'agriculture biologique
products.labels: Bio, Bio européen, Agriculture non UE, Agriculture UE, Agriculture UE/Non UE, FR-BIO-01, Point Vert, Nutriscore, Nutriscore A, AB Agriculture Biologique, Triman
products.facts: ["Made from 100% organic vegetables sourced from sustainable farms.","Packaged in eco-friendly materials to reduce environmental impact.","Contains no artificial preservatives or additives, ensuring high quality and natural taste.","Rich in nutrients and vitamins, supporting a healthy and balanced diet."]

products.name: Malt Loaf (Lunchbox Sized)
products.categories: Snacks, Sweet snacks, Biscuits and cakes, Cakes
products.facts: ["Malt Loaf is typically made from malt extract, flour, water, and yeast.","It is often packaged in eco-friendly materials to reduce environmental impact.","Malt Loaf is a low-fat snack option, making it a healthier choice for lunchboxes.","Many brands use natural ingredients without artificial preservatives for better quality."]

products.name: Swiss style muesli
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Breakfasts, Cereals and potatoes, Cereals and their products, Breakfast cereals, Mueslis, Bircher-style mueslis, Muesli flakes not fortified with vitamins and chemical elements, en:mueslis-with-fruits
products.facts: ["Swiss style muesli typically contains rolled oats, nuts, seeds, and dried fruits, providing a balanced mix of nutrients.","Many brands of Swiss style muesli prioritize organic ingredients, supporting sustainable farming practices.","The packaging of Swiss style muesli is often eco-friendly, using recyclable materials to reduce environmental impact.","Swiss style muesli is known for its high quality, often made with whole ingredients and without artificial additives or preservatives."]

products.name: White chocolate with coconut flakes and cornflakes, coconut flakes and cornflakes
products.labels: Fair trade,Fairtrade International,Sustainable farming,FSC,FSC Mix,UTZ Certified
products.facts: ["Contains white chocolate made from cocoa butter, sugar, and milk solids.","Coconut flakes are typically made from dried coconut meat, offering healthy fats and fiber.","Cornflakes provide a crunchy texture and are often fortified with vitamins and minerals.","Sustainably sourced ingredients can contribute to better ecological practices in food production."]

products.name: Farines de blé type T45
products.labels: Nutriscore, Nutriscore A, Blé français, Garantie sans grumeaux
products.packaging: Plastique, Papier, Sachet, Product, Sachet refermable
products.facts: ["Farines de blÃ© type T45 is made from finely milled wheat flour, ideal for pastries and delicate baked goods.","The production of T45 flour typically involves sustainable farming practices that minimize environmental impact.","This flour has a low ash content, indicating high quality and purity, which contributes to its light texture.","T45 flour is often enriched with vitamins and minerals to enhance its nutritional profile."]

products.labels: Bio, Bio européen, Agriculture non UE, FR-BIO-01, AB Agriculture Biologique
products.facts: ["500 g is a common weight measurement for various materials, including food items and packaging.","In terms of ecology, 500 g of biodegradable materials can decompose in a matter of weeks, reducing landfill waste.","Quality of products weighing 500 g can vary widely, with premium items often using higher-grade materials for better durability.","500 g of recycled materials can save significant energy compared to producing new materials, promoting sustainability."]

products.name: Finest Wholemeal Loaf
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Cereals and potatoes, Breads, Sliced breads, Wholemeal breads
products.facts: ["Made with 100% wholemeal flour for higher fiber content.","Contains no artificial additives or preservatives, ensuring natural quality.","Packaged in eco-friendly materials to reduce environmental impact.","Sourced from sustainably grown grains to support ecological farming practices."]

products.name: Coco Pops
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Breakfasts, Cereals and potatoes, Cereals and their products, Breakfast cereals, Chocolate cereals, Extruded cereals
products.facts: ["Coco Pops are made primarily from rice, sugar, and cocoa powder.","The packaging of Coco Pops is recyclable, contributing to reduced waste.","Coco Pops contain added vitamins and minerals, enhancing their nutritional profile.","The cereal is produced with a focus on quality control to ensure consistency in taste and texture."]

products.name: Robinsons Orange Squash
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Beverages, Plant-based beverages, Fruit-based beverages
products.facts: ["Robinsons Orange Squash is made from real fruit juice, ensuring a natural flavor.","The packaging is made from recyclable materials, promoting environmental sustainability.","Robinsons is committed to reducing sugar content in their drinks, enhancing their health quality.","The product is free from artificial colors and preservatives, aligning with clean label trends."]

products.name: Nutella
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Breakfasts, Fats, Spreads, Sweet spreads, Vegetable fats, fr:Pâtes à tartiner, Hazelnut spreads, Chocolate spreads, Cocoa and hazelnuts spreads
products.facts: ["Nutella is made primarily from sugar, palm oil, hazelnuts, cocoa solids, and milk powder.","The palm oil used in Nutella is sourced from sustainable plantations to minimize ecological impact.","Nutella is free from artificial preservatives and colors, ensuring high quality and natural taste.","The glass jar used for Nutella is recyclable, promoting eco-friendly practices."]
